description: IEMOCAP - Interactive Emotional Dyadic Motion Capture database for speech emotion recognition

source.name: IEMOCAP
source.citation: Busso et al., IEMOCAP: Interactive emotional dyadic motion capture database, Journal of Language Resources and Evaluation, 2008

license.name: IEMOCAP End User License Agreement
license.notes: Academic use only. Requires signed EULA from USC SAIL lab. Commercial use prohibited.

download.notes: Request access via SAIL lab website. Approval typically takes 1-2 weeks. See docs/IEMOCAP_SETUP.md for detailed instructions.

audio_format.notes: Mono audio extracted from original recordings. 16kHz standard for emotion recognition.

annotation_format.notes: Multiple annotator labels with majority voting. Categories: angry, happy, sad, neutral, frustrated, excited, fearful, surprised, disgusted, other.

sample_discovery.notes: 5 sessions, each with scripted and improvised dialogues. ~12 hours total audio.

meta.notes: IEMOCAP contains dyadic conversations between pairs of actors performing scripted and improvised scenarios. Standard benchmark for speech emotion recognition. Emotions labeled by multiple annotators with agreement scores.
